heist.concurrent.shared

Class ControlCollectionSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • heist.concurrent.shared.ControlCollectionSite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControlCollectionSite

    public class ControlCollectionSite
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControlCollectionSite
    The ControlCollection site is where the OrdinaryThieves deliver the canvas to the MasterThief. It is also responsible for decisions taken by booth the MasterThief and the OrdinaryThieves.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlCollectionSite(Configuration configuration, Museum museum)
      Collection site constructor, creates a queue for OrdinaryThief.

    • Method Detail

      • hasThief

        public boolean hasThief()
        Check if there is some thief waiting in the collection site.
        Returns:
        True if there is some thief in the collection site.

      • getParties

        public AssaultParty[] getParties()
        Get parties queue, contains the last parties created during this simulation. These parties are used for logging.
        Returns:
        Parties created during the simulation.

      • somePartyAvailable

        public boolean somePartyAvailable()
        Check if there is some party available to be prepared and sent.
        Returns:
        True if there is some party in DISMISSED state.

      • allRoomsClear

        public boolean allRoomsClear()
        Checks if all rooms are clear. Uses internal RoomStatus objects inside MasterThief object.
        Returns:
        True if all rooms are clear.

      • nextTargetRoom

        public RoomStatus nextTargetRoom()
        Get next room to assign to a party.
        Returns:
        Next room to assign, null if all rooms have already been assigned.

      • totalPaintingsStolen

        public int totalPaintingsStolen()
        Check how many paintings were stolen.
        Returns:
        Number of paintings.

      • canCreateParty

        public boolean canCreateParty()
        Check if there is conditions to create a new party.
        Returns:
        True if there is conditions to create a new party.

      • amINeeded

        public boolean amINeeded(OrdinaryThief thief)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Check if the OrdinaryThief is still needed or if he can be terminated. The OrdinaryThief blocks until prepareAssaultParty or sumUpResults is called by the MasterThief.
        Specified by:
        amINeeded in interface ControlCollectionSite
        Parameters:
        thief - OrdinaryThief to check.
        Returns:
        True if the OrdinaryThief is still needed
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • prepareNewParty

        public AssaultParty prepareNewParty(RoomStatus room)
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        MasterThief call this function to prepare an assault party to be filled with OrdinaryThieves waiting in the concentration site.
        Specified by:
        prepareNewParty in interface ControlCollectionSite
        Parameters:
        room - Target room.
        Returns:
        AssaultParty created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • appraiseSit

        public int appraiseSit()
                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Analyse the situation and take a decision for the MasterThief. Decision can be to create a new assault party, take a rest or to sum up results and end the heist.
        Specified by:
        appraiseSit in interface ControlCollectionSite
        Returns:
        New state to be attributed tho the MasterThief.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • getRoomToAttack

        public RoomStatus getRoomToAttack()
        MasterThief gets a room for the OrdinaryThieves to attack. The room is marked undeAttack by a partySize number of thieves.
        Specified by:
        getRoomToAttack in interface ControlCollectionSite
        Returns:
        Returns RoomStatus that describes the room to be attacked.

      • takeARest

        public void takeARest()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Function used to make MasterThief wait until a OrdinaryThief arrives and wakes him up.
        Specified by:
        takeARest in interface ControlCollectionSite
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • handACanvas

        public void handACanvas(OrdinaryThief thief)
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Add thief to the collection site and wake up the MasterThief to collect its canvas. The OrdinaryThief enters the queue wakes up the MasterThief and waits until is waken up.
        Parameters:
        thief - Thief to be added.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception.

      • collectCanvas

        public void collectCanvas()
                   throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Function to allow the MasterThief to get the canvas bough by OrdinaryThieves. The MasterThief wakes up the OrdinaryThieves waiting for their canvas to be collected. Updates the RoomStatus after receiving a painting from that room. If an empty handed thief arrives marks the room as clean.
        Specified by:
        collectCanvas in interface ControlCollectionSite
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception

      • sumUpResults

        public void sumUpResults()
        Called by the MasterThief to indicate that the heist is over.
        Specified by:
        sumUpResults in interface ControlCollectionSite
